title: DCAT Dataset properties as strings
description: The [DCAT Dataset](https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/#class-dataset) properties represented as strings.  This aspect is intended to be quite permissive of arbitrary property values, even those that may be difficult or impossible to interpret.

title.title: A name given to the dataset.

issued.title: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the dataset.

modified.title: Most recent date on which the dataset was changed, updated or modified.

publisher.title: An entity responsible for making the dataset available.

accrualPeriodicity.title: The frequency at which the dataset is published.

accrualPeriodicityRecurrenceRule.title: The recurrence rule that describes the frequency at which the dataset is published. Only used when `accrualPeriodicity`'s value is `custom`

temporal.title: The temporal period that the dataset covers.

start.title: The state date of the temporal period.

end.title: The end date of the temporal period.

themes.title: The main category of the dataset. A dataset can have multiple themes.

keywords.title: Tags
keywords.description: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.

contactPoint.title: Free-text account of who to contact about this dataset.

landingPage.title: A Web page that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the dataset, its distributions and/or additional information. This should only be a MAGDA landing page if MAGDA is the official source of this dataset.

defaultLicense.title: Default license for any distributions contained by this dataset.
